ygData.subject: Re: New guild forming up on Bertoxx
ygData.msgSnippet: I see your address is templarknights. Is that the name of your guild? For the Templar Knights were holy warriors in the crusades, and I had planned to use this
ygData.messageBody:
I see your address is templarknights. Is that the name of your guild? For
the Templar Knights were holy warriors in the crusades, and I had planned to
use this name for an all-Paladin guild for obvious reasons. I'm not sayin
dont use the name cuz my guild never got off the ground, and I play a wizard
now, but im just interested if it's the name for an evil guild.

----- Original Message -----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>; <EQ_Neriak@onelist.com>;
<EQ-Shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 8:28 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] New guild forming up on Bertoxx


> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> A new "evil" guild is forming up this Saturday (August 14th 9:30PM EST -
> Eastern) on Bertoxxulous, and founding members are still being recruited.
> Ogres, trolls, dark elves, euridites, and humans (based upon class) are
> being accepted. The guild highly encourages roleplaying, but is not
> necessary. We are banding together as a tightknit and elite group, to
enable
> a diversified "pool" from which we can form hunting parties of trustworthy
> individuals, for the purposes of advancing our guild objectives, and
> ourselves (in level, stature, power, wealth, in character, out of
character
> etc.) If interested, please email inquiries to templarknights@...
>
>
